channel.title: Environmental Topics
channel.description: Updated Environmental Topics content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: Environmental Information by Location
item.description: EPA’s mission, to protect human health and the environment, means working with stakeholders in every corner of the US. EPA has Regional offices that have a responsibility to oversee the execution of EPA programs within several states and territories. This page will help you find information on environmental conditions and EPA activities relevant to specific locations of the United States.
item.dc:creator: smays

item.title: Greener Living
item.description: Our actions impact the environment. Each thing we do can help or hurt our planet in many ways. EPA has tools to help you learn and understand the issues and help you reduce your environmental footprint. Learn more at EPA's Sustainability and Pollution Prevention (P2) sites, or in the Greener Living Frequent Questions.
item.dc:creator: abramer

item.title: Chemicals and Toxics Topics
item.description:

  • Formaldehyde
  • Mercury
  • Lead
  • Asbestos
  • Hazardous/Toxic Air Pollutants
  • Polychlorinated Biphenyls (PCBs)
  • Radon
  • Pesticide Chemicals
item.dc:creator: mbanta

item.title: Health Topics
item.description: EPA provides information on the environmental hazards that can threaten our health in our everyday lives. Keep informed about how you can keep yourself and your family healthy and safe.
item.dc:creator: mbanta

item.title: Air Topics
item.description: Learn how air pollution can harm your health and the environment and what EPA is doing to protect the air we breathe.
